item.title: They Don't Need ML
item.description: I will write a query like select from order table where last shop date is 3 or greater months. When we get this information, we will send a nice “we miss you, come back and here’s X Naira voucher” email. The conversation rate for this one was always greater than 50%. So-called artificial intelligence and machine learning tools are in fashion these days, and the impetus is to apply them to all problem sets.
